text: Okay, let’s discuss something first: Terms like “organic” and “natural” are not regulated by the FDA, which means that big ol’ “organic” stamp on your sunscreen label is pretty much meaningless. Sorry to burst your little bubble. So how do you know what’s actually organic or natural when it comes to sunscreen? You need to flip the bottle over and read the label. But because I know you don’t have time to be scouring different ingredient lists while standing in the skincare aisle at the drugstore, I’ve rounded up 30 of the best organic, natural, and clean beauty sunscreens that really, truly are what they say they are. They are all mineral-based formulas (so they use zinc and/or titanium dioxide to protect your skin), and made with good-for-you plant-based ingredients too. Find your new formula, below, and get slathering.
